On an organical planet,there's a huge house with a training ground 
and a young warrior hardly on it night and day to become the 
strongest.An old guy came toward him.

Silk:Pegatron,like you know today is your day of glory.The day you'll 
go on for yourself fighting alone like its supposed in our tradition.

Pegatron:I know sensei I was waiting for this moment for years.

Silk:Come with me we'll lauch you out to space.

Pegatron nodded and followed him inside a mansion.He gets in a ship 
and a blast was heard kilometers away.The little ship who was 
transporting only one member flew out to space during lots and lots 
of time.But one day he entered the asteroid belt.

Pegatron:Dammit!I can't control it anymore!Onoly luck can save me 
now.....I hope I wont crash in that star.Then he sat comfortably in 
his chair and waited three days.

ooc:I have no time left I'll finish that post later.
